title: MBTI Guessr
description: Developed a full-stack web application that predicts MBTI personality types based on user input using machine learning, built four separate Naive Bayes classifiers for each MBTI dichotomy, deployed the model and Flask API on Render, implemented dynamic prediction results with top 3 MBTI guesses and animated GIFs.

title: Damage Prediction by Wildfires
description:
Developed ML model to predict wildfire damage using CAL FIRE data, Applied data cleaning, EDA, feature engineering, and model optimization
              Evaluated Logistic Regression, Random Forest, XGBoost, LightGBM, Deployed an interactive demo for real-time risk assessment.

title: Healthy Recipes Analysis Website
description: Analyzed food.com recipes using hypothesis testing and EDA, Built Random Forest model with 95% test accuracy, Created Plotly visualizations embedded on GitHub Pages.
